item.title: About
item.description: I am currently the VP of Research and Technology at Zuva where I oversee the Engineering, Product, Design, Research, and Legal Knowledge Engineering departments and as an executive help other departments where I can. My day-to-day work generally involves helping my teams to set directions and measure progress on their goals. I still occassionally do development and research as part of my role but it is not a primary objective at the moment.
